resources.string:
+ - additions. A + B. (N-ary operator)
 - - subtraction. A - B. (N-ary operator)
 * - multiplication. A * B. (N-ary operator)
 / - division. A / B. (N-ary operator)
 ^ - power. A ^ B. (Binary operator)
 ( ) - parentheses.
